Visual Code Space is a modern code editor for Android devices, designed to provide a seamless and efficient coding experience on the go. It features a fast file explorer, multi-language syntax highlighting, a tabbed editor, an integrated terminal emulator, and plugin support, all while being ad-free.

𝗕𝗢𝗥𝗚𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗖 | Automated and secure backups for servers and workstations, including file systems and databases, with integrated monitoring and retention policies.  🔥 Super Hot!

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Automated and secure backups for servers and workstations, including file systems and databases, with integrated monitoring and retention policies.
📅 Created: Nov 2014 • Updated: Oct 2025

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Configuration-driven backups
✅ Client-side encryption
✅ Database backups (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, SQLite)
✅ Integration with monitoring services (Healthchecks, Uptime Kuma, Cronitor, Cronhub)
✅ Support for various storage technologies (ZFS, Btrfs, LVM)
✅ Retention policy management
✅ Custom command execution before/after backup actions


◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 2.1K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 107 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 0 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

borgmatic is a configuration-driven backup software designed for servers and workstations. It leverages Borg Backup to provide client-side encryption, database backups, and monitoring through third-party integrations, simplifying the backup process with a focus on automation and ease of use.

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/borgmatic-collective/borgmatic

𝗡𝗢𝗢𝗡𝗘_𝗩𝗜𝗗𝗘𝗢 | Video anonymization by blurring detected faces.  🌟 Rising Fast!

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Video anonymization by blurring detected faces.
📅 Created: Dec 2019 • Updated: Oct 2025

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Face detection using Haar cascades
✅ Face detection using DNN (various configurations)
✅ Video anonymization through face blurring
✅ DNN with no crop
✅ DNN with crop
✅ DNN with split videos by ratio
✅ DNN with split videos by crop size


✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐ 90 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 11 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 5 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

The repository provides a set of methods for face detection in videos using OpenCV, including Haar cascades and DNN-based approaches. It allows for blurring faces in videos for anonymization purposes, offering different DNN configurations with and without cropping or scanning.

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/JeiKeiLim/noone_video

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🦀 Rust 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Code editing and development, both locally and remotely.
📅 Created: Feb 2018 • Updated: Oct 2025

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Built-in LSP support
✅ Modal editing (Vim-like)
✅ Built-in remote development support
✅ Plugins support (WASI)
✅ Built-in terminal


◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 37.5K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 1.2K 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 801 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Lapce is a lightning-fast and powerful code editor written in Rust, utilizing technologies like Rope Science and wgpu for performance. It offers features like built-in LSP support, modal editing (Vim-like), remote development capabilities inspired by VSCode, plugin support via WASI, and an integrated terminal.

◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📘 TypeScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Visually building and designing web applications and websites with optional code integration.
📅 Created: Feb 2021 • Updated: Oct 2025

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Visual building of apps and websites
✅ Drag and drop interface
✅ Codebase integration
✅ Content management capabilities
✅ Support for React components
✅ Low-code development

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 6.4K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 620 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 0 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Plasmic is a visual builder for the web that allows users to design and build applications and websites with or without code. It integrates with existing codebases, enabling developers and non-developers to create content-managed pages, internal tools, and websites by dragging and dropping components.

┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅┅
